metadata.title: CVE-2015-0227 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache WSS4J before 1.6.17 and 2.x before 2.0.2 allows remote attackers tobypass the requireSignedEncryptedDataElements configuration via a vectorsrelated to "wrapping attacks."

criterions.comment: wss4j: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
